app_detail:
Are you fed up with spending hours searching for baby names without ever agreeing with your spouse? Do you hate spending time scouring websites? Want to find a fun and easy way to pass the time when travelling? Then "Baby Name Together" is the app for you! ğŸ˜­ ğŸ˜±

Create your list of favorite names and allow the app to compare it with your spouse's list. No more headaches or endless discussions... Choose THE perfect name from the short list of matching names. ğŸ˜ ğŸ‰ ğŸ’•

How it works?

1/ ğŸ”— Both parents install the app. on their phone or tablet, and link their accounts through their email address
2/ ğŸ’– Choose which names you love, or hate, whenever you want
3/ ğŸ“ƒ Check out boy or girl names that you both love in the matching list
4/ ğŸ‰ Excellent ! You have the perfect name for your newborn !

Best Features :

â€¢ ğŸ˜ More than 30 000 baby names for boys and girls from all origins 
â€¢ ğŸ’• Link your list and see names that you both like in the short list of matching names
â€¢ ğŸ“ƒ Find useful information on given names (name meanings, statistics per country, Popularity & average age as well as celebrities with that name)
â€¢ ğŸ§ Listen the pronunciation of each name in different languages


Access our parent community 

â€¢ â• Submit or consult names proposed by the community
â€¢ ğŸ’¬ A forum dedicated to parents to discuss topics related to names, pregnancy and parenthood
â€¢ ğŸ“Š Create a poll and organize a vote to ask your friends, family or others users if they also love the name that you are thinking about for your baby
â€¢ ğŸ† Need inspiration? View the best first names for boy or girl by country (France, India, Italy, Japan, Mexico, New Zealand, Netherlands, Portugal, United Kingdom, Switzerland & Sweden)
â€¢ ğŸ“° Stay tuned for the latest news about baby names (celebrity baby names, top etc.)

Cool Features :

â€¢ Use our advanced filter to find names perfectly suited to your criteria: Gender (unisex/boy/girl names), first/last letter, length of the name or compound names
â€¢ A name list including original, cool, unusual and unique boy or girl names
â€¢ Manage easily you name list : Select, add or remove your favorite names
â€¢ Send your favorite names to your email address
â€¢ 2 interfaces are available: Classic with a list or modern by swiping.
â€¢ Baby Name Origins: Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, India, Ireland, Italy, Japan, Netherlands, Norway, French Polynesia, Portugal, Scotland, Sweden, United Kingdom/USA.

To help us to improve the App
, additional features are proposed in the App including:

â€¢ Each week, receive new exclusive names in your list
â€¢ Add more than 3300 names from different themes.
â€¢ Add your last name or middle name in your name list
â€¢ Unlimited name pronunciation, name details, polls and community names
â€¢ Multi-Device : Use your list on all your devices in same times (smartphones & tablets)
â€¢ Cloud Storage : Your name list is saved online and can be retrieved for your next baby.
â€¢ Send your list of favorite names by email
â€¢ Ad Free
